author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has ordered the release of water from Tirumurthy Dam in Tirupur district for irrigation from Friday (January 29).

Following representations from farmers in the districts, water would be released through Parambikulam Main Canal, Udumalpet Canal and High Level Canal.

It would benefit over 94,521 acres of land in Tirupur and Coimbatore districts, Ms. Jayalalithaa said in a statement .
title: Release of water from dam ordered
